movie_title: Too old to have a baby? ⏲️ 6 Minute English
introduction: Why are women having babies later in life? What is society's attitude to older parents? Beth and Nei

vocabulary.definition: unusual or significant facts and events that exist and are talked about
vocabulary.example: The sudden increase in online shopping during the pandemic is a fascinating phenomena to study.

vocabulary.definition: to continue to exist for longer than usual or expected
vocabulary.example: The smell of fresh bread lingered in the kitchen long after baking.

vocabulary.definition: to make a woman pregnant who then gives birth to a child
vocabulary.example: He decided to father a child with his longtime partner.

vocabulary.definition: to give someone praise, congratulations or encouragement
vocabulary.example: His colleagues patted him on the back for completing the project ahead of schedule.

vocabulary.definition: a way of saying you hope something will not happen
vocabulary.example: God forbid that we experience another natural disaster this year.

vocabulary.definition: the period of ten years in life between 40 and 49
vocabulary.example: She achieved great success in her forties, both personally and professionally.
